video.title: Accidentally in Love
video.synopsis: Rejecting the demands of her wealthy family, a young woman poses as an ordinary college student and crosses paths with a stoic pop star at school.

episodes.synopsis: After ditching her own wedding, young heiress Chen Qingqing disguises herself as a panhandler and bumps into a pop star running from his dad's wedding.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: In an act of rebellion, Situ Feng drags Qingqing to his dad's wedding and makes an earth-shattering announcement. Gu Nanxi bumps into Qingqing again.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Zhang Fangfang gives Qingqing a tour of Ming De College, where Qingqing confronts three hostile queen bees and gets kicked out by security.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: On the first day of class, Qingqing declares desk mate Situ Feng her archrival and learns that Gu Nanxi may be the gatekeeper to information on her dad.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Qingqing launches a vending scheme to help Fangfang earn enough cash to stay in school, and tries to sell classmates tickets to her desk near Situ Feng.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: To give Qingqing a hard time, Lan Xinya assigns her to manual labor at the student union. Qingqing tricks Situ Feng into performing a surprise show.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: To win a cash prize for Fangfang, Qingqing joins a competition to star with Situ Feng in a music video  -- but she must revert to her old self to win.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: On Situ Feng and Qing Chen's first day of filming, fans bombard the location of the shoot. Lin Yiyang abducts Qingqing and Fangfang to bait Situ Feng.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Situ Feng tells Qing Chen of his past with Lan Xinyu. When Lan Xinya accuses Qingqing of selling expired snacks, Situ Feng finds a way to absolve her.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Situ Feng drinks too much wine and tries to kiss Qingqing in front of classmates. Yiyang helps Fangfang ward off a group of street thugs.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Qingqing visits an under-the-weather Situ Feng. Gu Nanxi comes to a sudden realization when he sees Qingqing playing the piano at rehearsal.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Qingqing discovers the real reason why Situ Feng called off the music video. At her teacher Chen Xiao's place, Qingqing finds a photo of her parents.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Situ Feng tells Qing Chen about Qingqing -- and suggests an introduction. When Gu Nanxi's brother spites Qingqing, Situ Feng stands firmly by her side.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: To convince her grandpa to let her stay at Ming De College, Qingqing enters a beauty contest, where she schools the judges on beauty standards.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: When the mandatory school trip coincides with Qing Chen and Situ Feng's music video shoot, Qingqing must pull off a series of quick outfit changes.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: When Qingqing skips school, Situ Feng cross-dresses to sneak into the women's dorm and check on her. Qingqing finds out the truth about her parents.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Lin Yiyang bullies Qingqing after Xinya complains to him about her. A violent showdown triggers memories of a tragic event in Situ Feng's past.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Situ Feng visits Fangfang in the hospital and brings Yiyang steamed buns. Qingqing is determined to help Situ Feng overcome his fear of water.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Qingqing's grandpa helps her set up a fake home in the village for Situ Feng's unannounced visit and invites Qingqing's friend Xiao Lan to test him.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Xiao Lan interrupts Situ Feng and Qingqing's heart-to-heart in the countryside. Yiyang blackmails Qingqing while Situ Feng is away for work.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of the plagiarism scandal, Situ Feng has only days before the release to write a new song. Fangfang pleads with Yiyang to tell the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: After Situ Feng's press conference, Yiyang gets in trouble with Situ Feng fans. Over dinner, Gu Nanxi encourages Qingqing to come clean to Situ Feng.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Lan Xinya's ploy turns Situ Feng against Qingqing and Gu Nanxi. Qingqing's web alias receives an offer from Situ Feng's manager for the new album.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Qingqing dresses as a panda for her business meeting with Situ Feng. The clock tower responds in a man's voice when Qingqing asks it to turn back time.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Yang Lanting and Xinya scheme against Qingqing during a beach outing. Xinya ends up in the hospital after Situ Feng asks Qingqing to be his girlfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Situ Feng receives an urgent note from Xinya and finds himself in a bind when Lanting guilts him into leaving Qingqing.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: After a teary phone call with Situ Feng, Qingqing tells her grandpa she'd like to take on the family business. Xinya gets a surprise at the altar.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Hua Munian offers to help Xinya overcome her sorrow. Situ Feng and Qingqing decide to reveal her true identity to fans -- but someone beats them to it.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Situ Feng disguises himself for his outing with Qingqing, who faces internet trolls and sets out to prove herself a good Samaritan.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Situ Feng encourages Qingqing to devote more time to her drawings. Months later, Situ Feng receives an offer from a record label in the U.S.
episodes.title: Episode 30
